dict.string:
Swedish–English

Dictionary from Swedish to English and English to Swedish with the database from Folkets lexikon.

Authors: Christopher Loessl and Ivan Ukhov

Version: 2.0 (2016-02-07)

Usage

  • Tap a word with three fingers on the touchpad.
  • Hover the cursor over a word and press Command-Control-D.
  • Open the Dictionary application.

License

The People’s Dictionary is free. Both the English-Swedish and Swedish-English dictionaries can be downloaded for use under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.5 Generic license.

The source code to build this dictionary can be found at GitHub.
